channel.title: NPCdrops.CFG help (and others)

item.title: NPCdrops.CFG help (and others)
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

NPCdrops, don’t waste your time on that, It won’t work (unless you wanna make time to fix it)

//------NpcID--CoordX-CoordY-Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9

1 = Npcid
2 = Xcoord where the npc is spawned at the start of running your server
3 = Ycoord where the npc is spawned at the start of running your server
4 = the height, the ground is height 0
5 = take like -2 of the orig. coord X
6 = take like -2 of the orig. coord Y
7 = take like +2 of the orig. coord X
8 = take like +2 of the orig. coord Y
9 = 1 means a standing NPC(shopkeeper, banker), 2 means a walking npc (monster)

Read full topic

item.title: NPCdrops.CFG help (and others)
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

//--------NPCID—DropType—Item—Amount
npcdrop = 1 1 995 3

OK, I worked this out, it’s simple. But i dont know what the “Drop type” is. Any help.

//------NpcID–CoordX-CoordY-Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

Also, I worked out the first four. I think I know what walk type is, whether or not they use 2 squares to walk. and description is obvious. Any help explaining them?

Read full topic
